typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudsalescustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudstreamingcustomer
cloudsalescustomer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
cloudstreamingcustomer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(source = "CloudSales") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dimcustomers'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> adlsfinalcustomercloudsales
